0x78935A27.name: _SET_PED_HEAD_OVERLAY_COLOR

params.name: overlayID
params.description: An integer representing the overlay id

params.name: colorType
params.description: 1 for eyebrows, beards, makeup, and chest hair; 2 for blush and lipstick; and 0 otherwise, though not called in those cases.

params.name: colorID
params.description: An integer representing the primary color id

params.name: secondColorID
params.description: An integer representing the secondary color id

0x78935A27.description:
```
Used for freemode (online) characters.
Called after SET_PED_HEAD_OVERLAY().
```

**Note:**
You may need to call [`SetPedHeadBlendData`](#\_0x9414E18B9434C2FE) prior to calling this native in order for it to work.

**This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native [\_SET_PED_HEAD_OVERLAY_COLOR](?\_0x497BF74A7B9CB952).**
